subtitle: A good old fashioned filling pudding.

method.text: Beat the butter in a bowl until really soft. Beat in the sugar, egg, ginger, flour, orange rind and juice, until well mixed. Spoon the mixture into a lightly greased 1.15 Iitre pudding basin. Cover with a pleated piece of foil.
Place into a steamer on the hob. Cover and steam for 1 hr 15 min - 1 hr 30 min.
In a small pan, heat the syrup and orange segments together gently.
Turn out the pudding onto a warmed serving plate. Top with the syrup and orange sauce. Decorate with orange rind.

title: Steamed orange and syrup pudding
